design.custom_css: ion-title { display: none; } .header:before { width: 150px; content: ""; background-image: url(assets/logo2.png) !important; background-size: 150px 30px !important; height: 100%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; z-index: 100; position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; top: 0; margin: auto; } .document-icon { width: 100% !important; } .document-icon > a { display: table !important; table-layout: fixed; border: none !important; text-decoration: none !important; } .document-icon > a > img { display: table-cell !important; min-width: 50px!important; width:50px; } .document-icon > a > span { display: table-cell !important; text-align: left !important; vertical-align: middle !important; padding-left: 10px; } .document-icon > a:hover { opacity: 0.3 !important; } .document-icon > a:hover > span { text-decoration: none; } .document-icon-row.descriptions > .document-icon { max-width: none !important; } .post-list ion-slides .slide-title { display:none; } /*REMOVE FEATURED IMAGES ON API POST LIST*/ .label .post-cardlist-featured-wrap { display: none; } img.post-slider-featured.wp-post-image { min-height: 100% !important; min-width:100% !important; max-height: 1000% !important; max-width: 1000% !important; margin: auto; } .post-list ion-slides { height: 40vh; } span.post-slidertitle { position: absolute; left: 0; right:0; top: 0; height:20vh; padding-left: 5vw; padding-right:5vw; padding-top: 3vh; text-align: left; color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.52); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,0,0,0.52) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.31) 41%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 72%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); background: -webkit-gradient(left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.52)), color-stop(41%, rgba(0,0,0,0.31)), color-stop(72%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15)), color-stop(100%, rgba(0,0,0,0))); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,0,0,0.52) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.31) 41%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 72%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,0,0,0.52) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.31) 41%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 72%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,0,0,0.52) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.31) 41%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 72%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0,0,0,0.52) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.31) 41%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 72%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#000000', endColorstr='#000000', GradientType=0 ); }
